tool_description: Retrieves customer profile information including loyalty tier, membership status, and account details needed for point calculations.

include_tier_benefits.description: Whether to include detailed tier benefit information

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer ID does not exist in the system.
Inactive account: Customer account is suspended or deactivated.
Data retrieval error: Unable to fetch customer profile due to system unavailability.
usage: Provide customer_id to retrieve their profile and loyalty tier information. Set include_tier_benefits to false if detailed benefit information is not needed.

loyalty_tier.description: Customer's current loyalty tier (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum)

membership_since.description: Date when customer joined the loyalty program

tier_multiplier.description: Point earning multiplier based on tier
